name: Tribal Warrior Spore Servants
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

actions.Spear: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d4 + 1 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
